products.name: COFFEESE COLOMBIA
products.description: A medium roast with notes of caramel and citrus.

products.name: COFFEESE VIETNAM
products.description: Bold and robust with chocolate undertones, perfect for strong coffee lovers.

products.name: COFFEESE BRAZIL
products.description: Nutty flavor profile with low acidity and a smooth finish.

products.name: COFFEESE THAILAND
products.description: Exotic with hints of spice and tropical fruit notes.

products.name: COFFEESE COSTA RICA
products.description: Bright and clean with a honey sweetness and mild acidity.

products.name: COFFEESE PHILIPPINES
products.description: Earthy with a full body and subtle notes of dark chocolate.

products.name: COFFEESE GUATEMALA
products.description: Complex flavor with floral notes and a spicy finish.

products.name: COFFEESE INDONESIA
products.description: Rich and earthy with low acidity and a syrupy body.
